[Be hit in mynde that in the ffest off seynt arkenewold the ixthe yer off kyng
Henry the vjth it is accorded by all the felawschip that ther schal be iiij revels
in the yeere and no mo that is to sayyng in the fest off [seint Hugh], all
[hak] Halowen] oon to the wych schall be contributorie as well tho p£৲sons
[the] wych were woned to paye to sent William ys revell as tho the wych
were woned paie to [the same], seynt Hugh is Revell and in the fest off
seint arkenwold another to wych schall be contributorie sent Edmond is
men. Item the iijde in the fest off Purificac€on off owre lady to wych all the
remen$¥nt schall be contributorie savyng seint Peter & seint Thomas men.
the fferthe on Midsomer day to wych sall be contributorie seynt Peter &
seint Thomas men. [all so it is accorded that aswell they ben absent as they
that be p৲£sent] It£m that hit be lawefulle to the collecto¥rs of eu£৲y revel to
make leve of eu£৲y p£৲son is dwete to the same revel & of hir maynp৲£no¥rs
is goodis with yn the said felavshippe
